SecureClient.SecureClient

Class ClientBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • SecureClient.SecureClient.ClientBuilder

  • public class ClientBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides all the methods for the client to perform various operations in the HCAP protocol. It provides functions such as establishing a secure communication channel with the servers, getting the initial capability from authorization server, updating the state at authorization server and getting an updated capability and reissuing a lost capability from both servers.
    Author:
    lakshya.tandon

      • ClientBuilder

        public ClientBuilder(java.lang.String propFileLocation)
        This is the Client Builder constructor, it reads the properties file and initializes the variables used in the class. It also read the X.509 certificate and establishes a connector to be used for DTLS.
